definitions.definition: A cartilaginous organ in the throat of terrestrial vertebrates covering the glottis when swallowing to prevent food and liquid from entering the trachea , and in Homo sapiens also a speech organ.

main_definition: ( anatomy ) A cartilaginous organ in the throat of terrestrial vertebrates covering the glottis when swallowing to prevent food and liquid from entering the trachea , and in Homo sapiens also a speech organ.
